sql.value: select id, menu_name, permission_code, router_path, parent_id, menu_type, is_menu, menu_status, component_path, is_external_link, icon_path, sort, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted, revision from sys_menu where is_deleted = 0 #[and is_menu = :isMenu] #[and permission_code = :permissionCode] #[and menu_name like :menuName] #[and menu_status = :menuStatus] #[and id in (:menuIds)] #[and parent_id = :parentId] order by sort, id desc

select id, menu_name, permission_code, router_path, parent_id, menu_type, is_menu, menu_status, component_path, is_external_link, icon_path, sort, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted, revision from sys_menu where is_deleted = 0 #[and id in (select menu_id from sys_role_menu where role_id = :roleId)] order by sort, id desc

select a.user_id, c.menu_id as id, d.menu_name,d.permission_code,d.router_path,d.parent_id,d.menu_type,d.is_menu,d.menu_status,d.component_path,d.is_external_link,d.icon_path,d.sort from sys_user_role a inner join sys_role b on (a.role_id=b.id) inner join sys_role_menu c on (a.role_id=c.role_id) inner join sys_menu d on (d.id = c.menu_id) where a.user_id in (:userIds) and d.is_menu = 1 and d.is_deleted = 0 and d.menu_status = 0 order by d.sort,d.id desc
